qa.name: Sherlock Paws
qa.appearance: Golden Retriever with a deerstalker hat

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a world where humans couldn't crack the case, it was up to me, Sherlock Paws, to sniff out the truth.
json_to_edit.description: Sherlock Paws investigates a mysterious disappearance at the city park.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, birds chirping, distant traffic
json_to_edit.name: Park Mystery
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Sherlock Paws, the talking detective dog, investigates a mysterious disappearance at the city park.

qa.action: A bustling city park on a sunny day, families enjoying picnics and games.

hf.action: Sherlock Paws enters the park, his nose twitching as he picks up a scent.

tr.action: Sherlock's keen eyes scan the area, his expression serious and focused.

xc.action: Sherlock Paws moves through the park, carefully examining the playground equipment.

ka.action: Sherlock Paws interviews a group of squirrels, who chatter excitedly in response.

fn.action: A child's drawing pad left behind on a park bench, with a half-finished sketch visible.

af.action: Sherlock Paws runs across the park, following a new lead.

qo.action: Sherlock Paws discovers a hidden clue behind a large oak tree.

fp.action: Sherlock Paws presents his findings to a gathered crowd, solving the mystery.

edit_command: Add a new shot after the third shot: a POV shot from Sherlock's perspective as he examines paw prints in the sandbox, with the sound of sand shifting under his paws.

label.rationale: we need to add a new shot after the third shot in the scene. the current third shot has the key "tr". we'll insert a new shot with a randomly generated key (let's use "zx") after this shot. we'll update the list_display_order to reflect this change and add the new shot details to the shots dictionary. the new shot will be a pov shot as requested, showing sherlock examining paw prints in the sandbox. we'll also include the appropriate sound effect of sand shifting under his paws.

value.action: From Sherlock's perspective, we see paw prints in the sandbox as he examines them closely.
